NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Retention and Engagement or the cell corresponding to Employee Relations and Satisfaction?

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.37 to 0.52?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Performance, Culture), (Retention, Culture), (Recruitment, Diversity), (Diversity & Inclusion, Engagement), (Workplace Safety, Engagement), (Employee Relations, Leadership), (Training, Leadership), (Diversity & Inclusion, Productivity), (Workplace Safety, Productivity), (Recruitment, Satisfaction), (Performance, Wellbeing), (Retention, Wellbeing)}.
